item.title: Tony Robbins Sues Over Unauthorized AI Chatbots
item.description: On YesChat, users can unleash their “inner cynic” with help from a Larry David bot. Or “explore Jewish wisdom” with another Larry David bot. Or workshop horror stories with a S
